text: Eyin ti e gbagbo ni ododo, nigba ti won ba so fun yin pe ki e gbara yin laye ninu awon ibujokoo, e gbara yin laye. Allahu yoo f’aye gba yin. Nigba ti won ba so pe: "E dide (sibi ise rere)." E dide (si i). Allahu yoo sagbega awon ipo fun awon t’o gbagbo ni ododo ati awon ti A fun ni imo ninu yin. Allahu si ni Alamotan nipa ohun ti e n se nise
